title: Deloitte Top 200: Clarus wins 2025 Diversity and Inclusion Leadership award
description: Building Belonging has more than halved Clarus’ gender pay gap.
content:
Armed with this insight, Clarus leadership elevated diversity and inclusion to a core strategic priority.
Clarus CEO Paul Goodeve says the company has long had TIGER values togetherness, integrity, … [+8732 chars]
